name: The Great Gatsby
shortDescription: A classic novel set in the Jazz Age, focusing on the mysterious Jay Gatsby.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
shortDescription: A story of racial injustice in the Deep South through the eyes of young Scout Finch.
A dystopian novel that delves into the dangers of totalitarianism.

name: Pride and Prejudice
shortDescription: A romantic novel that critiques the societal norms of 19th century England.

name: The Catcher in the Rye
shortDescription: A story about teenage angst and alienation told by Holden Caulfield.

name: The Hobbit
shortDescription: The prelude to the Lord of the Rings, featuring Bilbo Baggins' adventure.

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
shortDescription: The first book in the Harry Potter series where Harry discovers he is a wizard.

name: A Game of Thrones
shortDescription: The first book in the Song of Ice and Fire series, introducing the land of Westeros.

name: A Game of Thrones
shortDescription: A story of the magically gifted young man named Kvothe.

name: The Fellowship of the Ring
shortDescription: The first volume of the Lord of the Rings trilogy.

name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
shortDescription: A comprehensive history of the human species.

name: Educated
shortDescription: A memoir about a woman who grows up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho but eventually escapes to learn about the wider world through education.

name: Becoming
shortDescription: The memoir of former First Lady of the United States, Michelle Obama.

name: The Wright Brothers
shortDescription: The story of the Wright brothers and their invention of the airplane.

name: Unbroken
shortDescription: A World War II story of survival, resilience, and redemption.

name: The Power of Habit
shortDescription: An exploration of the science behind why habits exist and how they can be changed.

name: Atomic Habits
shortDescription: A guide to breaking bad behaviors and adopting good ones in four steps.

name: The Silent Patient
shortDescription: A psychological thriller about a woman who shoots her husband and then stops speaking.

name: Gone Girl
shortDescription: A thriller that examines the complexities of marriage and the dangerous secrets couples keep from each other.

name: The Girl on the Train
shortDescription: A psychological thriller about a woman who becomes involved in a missing person's investigation.

name: The Martian
shortDescription: A science fiction novel about an astronaut stranded on Mars and his struggle for survival.

name: Dune
shortDescription: A science fiction novel about a young nobleman who becomes embroiled in a struggle to control the desert planet Arrakis.

name: Neuromancer
shortDescription: A science fiction novel that tells the story of a washed-up computer hacker hired for one last job.

name: Foundation
shortDescription: A science fiction series about the fall and rise of a galactic empire.

name: Brave New World
shortDescription: A dystopian novel that imagines a future world of genetically modified citizens and an intelligence-based social hierarchy.

name: The Da Vinci Code
shortDescription: A mystery thriller that follows symbologist Robert Langdon as he uncovers a conspiracy within the Catholic Church.

name: The Shining
shortDescription: A horror novel about a family staying in an isolated hotel where the father descends into madness.

name: Dracula
shortDescription: A Gothic horror novel that tells the story of Count Dracula's attempt to move from Transylvania to England.

name: Frankenstein
shortDescription: A Gothic novel that tells the story of a young scientist who creates a sapient creature in an unorthodox scientific experiment.

name: The Haunting of Hill House
shortDescription: A horror novel that explores the eerie occurrences in an old mansion.
